item.title: Looking for a long-term partner
item.description: How it started As I’ve grown older (30+), I find myself spending more and more time alone. While I value my independence and peacefulness, I can’t help but feel a need to get a partner in crime to share my life with. The feeling of loneliness has started to creep in, and I’m ready to find someone to settle if possible. So I asked around in my friend circle, I often get asked the same question, “what kind of partner are you searching for?
